thread.title: Swiss stocks - Factors to watch on Feb 7

title: Swiss stocks - Factors to watch on Feb 7
text:
February 7, 2018 / 5:40 AM / Updated 9 minutes ago Swiss stocks - Factors to watch on Feb 7 Reuters Staff 1 Min Read 
ZURICH, Feb 7 (Reuters) - The following are some of the main factors expected to affect Swiss stocks on Wednesday. NESTLE 
The multinational food and beverage company said on Tuesday that it would stop buying palm oil from a Guatemalan company that has been accused by the country’s prosecutor of corruption. 
For more click COMPANY STATEMENTS 
* Meyer Burger said it filed a patent infringement lawsuit in China. 
* Addex Therapeutics said Jean-Philippe Rocher was named co-head of discovery and a member of executive management. 
* HNA’s Gategroup said it struck a longterm deal with Norwegian. ECONOMY
